text: Por ana phorga nzuav, tɨvir vhuuin muunga bunin ana nzuav, guma vhɨra tuituigip won kɨrɨ tɨvi gu bigi ganɨnganen ana phorga nzuav, vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme zumgum nza muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv nza suangane phorga ana nzuai. Ana nen Feriks ga nzuaim, Feriks ne mbararagiap, rivgi. Ana rivgiap, khaŋ Por ga nzuai, “Ndu ntige ŋgɨri! Gu zumgum tuk kɨrga, gu taagip ndu suaŋv kama ndi maanga.”
